reviewText: Video only plays half of movie, then turns black screen
Psalty is the best and teaches kids the values that God intends them to have through music - It will stick with them.

Some may find this a bit hokey (after all it is for small children) but my 3 1/2 year-old son loved it from the minute he saw it. It's live-action, and children sing Christian songs. The children also tell Psalty about problems they have and Psalty explains how God works in their lives to help them. It's very beginner, very basic, and a great video for a small child to watch to learn concepts of Christianity in an age-appropriate way.
